ARTICLE.TITLE: Only 32 confirmed recoveries from COVID-19 so far
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Posted: Friday, August 14, 2020. 5:54 pm CST.

By BBN Staff: Belize has gone over 300 confirmed cases of COVID-19, however preliminary data suggests that there have only been 32 confirmed recoveries so far.

Director of Health Services Dr. Marvin Manzanero explained that up to the session of Ask the Experts hosted this afternoon, the total number of confirmed recoveries stood at 32, but that updates to the situation are still pending for today.

With the latest 10 cases announced this afternoon, Belize has around 306 confirmed cases; based off that last official report the Ministry issued.

We will be updating the official numbers as soon as they are made available.
